Anime.title: One piece
Anime.description: One Piece Film: Red is the 15th One Piece movie, which was released on August 6, 2022. The film was first announced on November 21, 2021, in commemoration of Episode 1000's release.[2] Eiichiro Oda served as a general producer and supervisor for the film.

Anime.title: One punchman
Anime.description: One-Punch Man (Japanese: ワンパンマン, Hepburn: Wanpanman) is a Japanese superhero manga series created by One. It tells the story of Saitama, a superhero who, because he can defeat any opponent with a single punch, grows bored from a lack of challenge. One wrote the original webcomic manga version in early 2009.

Anime.title: Hero Academia
Anime.description: The series focuses on a middle school student Izuku Midoriya, who has no superpowers. Will he be able to become a hero and somehow to contribute to the peace and stability in the world, where the weak is the minority that needs to be defended.

Anime.title: Chainsaw man
Anime.description: Its chapters have been collected in 12 tankōbon volumes as of October 2022. Chainsaw Man follows the story of Denji, an impoverished young man who makes a contract that fuses his body with that of a dog-like devil named Pochita, granting him the ability to transform parts of his body into chainsaws.

Anime.title: Boruto
Anime.description: The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

Anime.title: Demon Slayer
Anime.description: A young man is transformed into a hideous 'moon beast' due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.

Anime.title: Baki
Anime.description: A woman seeks revenge on her former lover, who owns a skydiving business.

Anime.title: Hunter x Hunter
Anime.description: On an isolated island, a small group of people are terrorized by giant voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.

Anime.title: Parastye
Anime.description: A saboteur posing as a scientist strives to destroy the world's first space station.

Anime.title: Vinland Saga
Anime.description: Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.

Anime.title: High rise invasion
Anime.description: A series of murders in Michigan lead an American secret agent to Amsterdam, where he uncovers a plot to imperil the world with a potent new drug.

Anime.title: Blue Exorcist
Anime.description: A stock car driver goes undercover as the wheel man for a motorcycle gang.

Anime.title: Lookism
Anime.description: International man of mystery Diabolik and his lover pull off heist after heist, all while European cops led by Inspector Ginko and envious mobsters led by Ralph Valmont are closing in on them.

Anime.title: Kengan Ashura
Anime.description: Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.
